Twin Drifter

Two Char-grilled beef patties with melted white cheddar. Comes topped with our signature sauces on a toasted bun.

Pizza-Gedon

Stuffed with mozzarella, this New York Style deep dish pizza is the perfect addition for any house party.

Remy's Special

A modern twist on the world renowned Ratatouille. Layered with cheese and diced chicken.
